body:
This topic is about the top 10 best map makers or creators ever!
Tell your most favorite map makers you like.
Make a list add the numbers in order to who are the Super best to the regular best.

1.Koodalord
2.AwarriorVenum
3.Slicorn
4. Evocal
5.Paraspider
6. izjust4fun
7. Crazy Clownz
8. Shirokami
9.Awesome Apricot
10. AdrianG503

replies.body:
Ok now an honest list...

1: KooDaLord (Inspires me erryday)
2: G_SKIPPY (A legend, his maps still are considered good even if they were built one year ago)
3: Fishisea (He is really good.)
4: Evocal (Really nice duud with a good taste in details)
5: praspeder  (Same goes for both map devs :D)
6: Slicorn (He is getting better and better :OOOOO) (also he is phat)
7: itaity (Has nice ideas :D)
8: Izjust4fun and CrazyClowns  (Good taste in detailling)
9:  Adrian (When he really wants it he can build good stuff!)
10:  SweggyMango (Didnt post a map yet but really know how to build I can tell yu!)

replies.body:
In no particular order, the top map builders on this server would be KooDaLord, AwarriorVenom, Evocal, izjust4fun and Crazy_Clownz (in my opinion). ParaSpider, G_SKIPPY and ParaPenguin have also make some pretty amazing maps.

Other than those people there are certainly many more great builders, but there's too many to list! I believe that there are some pretty underrated staff who can build as well ;)
replies.body_tagged:
In no particular order, the top map builders on this server would be KooDaLord, AwarriorVenom, Evocal, izjust4fun and Crazy_Clownz (in my opinion). ParaSpider, G_SKIPPY and ParaPenguin have also make some pretty amazing maps.

Other than those people there are certainly many more great builders, but there's too many to list! I believe that there are some pretty underrated staff who can build as well ;)
